name: Pocket Volleyball
description:
Welcome to *Pocket Volleyball*.  I've tried to capture the game of volleyball in the smallest, simplest way possible.   Made in just a few days for LowRezJam 2021.

You are blue team, specifically you control the character closer to the camera.  It's your job to dig & recieve-- just get that ball up and your teammate will set it for you.  From there you get to spike it into the enemy side!  First team to 15 points wins.

Note! This is not quite finished. This version currently only supports controllers, no keyboard support.

Controls:

Left stick = move within the court + aim spikes

A button = OK

Coming in upcoming versions:

Bug fixes!

animation fixes!

keyboard support!

2 player VS mode!

I'd like to make an android version??  then it would live up to the "Pocket" name. this might not happen lol
